n = int(input())
q = list(map(int, input().split()))

q.sort()

p = [0] * n
p[0] = q[0]

for i in range(1, n - 1):
    p[i] = q[i] + p[i - 1]

p[n-1] = q[n-2] + p[n-2]

if p[n-1] < 1:
    print(-1)
else:
    print(*p)

n = int(input())
q = list(map(int, input().split()))

q.sort()

p = [0]*n

for i in range(1, n-1):
    p[i] = q[i] + p[i-1]

p[n-1] = q[n-2] + p[n-2]

if p[n-1] < 0:

n = int(input())
q = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

# first and last values of p
p_first = 0
p_last = n - 1

# check if possible
if sum(q) != 0:
	print(-1)
	exit()

# check if possible
for i in q:
	if abs(i) > n - 1:
		print(-1)
		exit()

# check if possible
for i in range(1, n):
	if q[i] == q[i-1]:
		print(-1)
		exit()

# calculate p
p = [0 for i in range(n)]
for i in range(n-1):
	p[i+1] = p[i] + q[i]

# check if possible
for i in p:
	if i > p_last or i < p_first:
		print(-1)
		exit()

# print possible p
print(*p)

n = int(input())
q = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

# first and last values of p
p_first = -1
p_last = n

# check if possible
if sum(q) != 0:
	print(-1)
	exit()

# check if possible - abs(i) < n
for i in q:
	if abs(i) >= n:
		print(-1)
		exit()

# check if possible - q[i] != q[i-1]
for i in range(1, n):
	if q[i] == q[i-1]:
		print(-1)
		exit()

# calculate p
p = [0 for i in range(n)]
for i in range(n-1):
	p[i+1] = p[i] + q[i]

# check if possible - p[i] > p_last or p[i] < p_first
for i in p:
	if i > p_last or i < p_first:
		print(-1)
		exit()

# print possible p
print(*p)

n = int(input())
q = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

if not all([-n < x < n for x in q]):
    print(-1)
else:
    p = [1]
    for i in range(n - 1):
        p.append(p[i] + q[i])
    if not all([1 <= x <= n for x in p]):
        print(-1)
    else:
        print(' '.join([str(x) for x in p]))


def get_permutation(q):
    n = len(q)
    p = [0] * n
    for i in range(n):
        p[q[i]] = i + 1
    return p

n = int(input())
q = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

if not all([-n < x < n for x in q]):
    print(-1)
else:
    p = [1]
    for i in range(1, n):
        p.append(p[-1] + q[i-1])
    if not all([1 <= x <= n for x in p]):
        print(-1)
    else:
        print(' '.join([str(x) for x in p]))
import sys

n = int(input())
q = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

if not all([-n < x < n for x in q]):
    sys.exit(-1)
else:
    p = [1]
    for i in range(1, n):
        p.append(p[-1] + q[i-1])
    if not all([1 <= x <= n for x in p]):
        sys.exit(-1)
    else:
        print(' '.join([str(x) for x in p]))


n = int(input())
q = list(map(int, input().split()))

q.sort()

p = [0]*n
p[0] = q[0]

for i in range(1, n-1):
    p[i] = q[i] + p[i-1] + 1

p[n-1] = q[n-2] + p[n-2] + 1

if p[n-1] < 1:
    print(-1)
else:
    print(*p)

n = int(input())
q = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

# check if possible
if sum(q) != 0:
    print(-1)
    exit()

# check if possible
for i in q:
    if abs(i) >= n:
        print(-1)
        exit()

# check if possible
for i in range(1, n):
    if q[i] == q[i-1]:
        print(-1)
        exit()

# check if possible

        print(-1)
        exit()
